content:
I've made the following changes:

Goal
* Changed "Sample" to "Example" (twice).

Input
* Added "space-separated".

* Removed explanation already mentioned in Goal section.

Tags
* Added the tag "Geometry".

Am I the only one who's actually able to edit around here?!

Fixed formatting. A lot. Fixed a lot of other minor stuff, but apparently I'm the only one who cares.

And approved.

I like this puzzle however yea I agree with Maxime, needs some refinement in formatting. Sample 2 looks alot cleaner than Sample 1. 

Maybe could use some test-case scenario names however I don't think it's necessary, but yea once the formatting is sorted I will approve.
Could we improve the formatting before approving the puzzle?
I like this puzzle.  However, shouldn't the tests/validators have descriptive names like "Convex quadrilateral", "Non-convex quadrilateral", "More points", "Many points".
May not difficult enough, but i like it.
Nice little puzzle. I vote to approve.

Does dropping a comment that flags a problem actually prevent the XP whores from approving now?

https://forum.codingame.com/t/community-puzzle-prime-transformations/1913/2?u=jbm
https://www.codingame.com/contributions/view/2324b037e19f805ebdaebbe00c60db8ce14?comment=3656&expand=true&utm_source=Contribution&utm_medium=new_comment_response&utm_content=button&utm_campaign=Notifications&utm_term=fr

Actually, the puzzle has been improved before validation, but it could also be luck... Do not hesitate to raise this problem and bring solutions on the forum. If there aren't enough complains, it won't be on top of our priority list of things to improve...
